message:
We have the following vacancies at GetSircles - please let us know if you are interested by forwarding your CV and portfolio to jobs@getsircles.com  Lead PHP Developer 

Skills 

+ A go-getter, who doesn’t accept something can’t be done because it’s never been done. 
+ 5+ years experience writing Object-Oriented PHP/mySQL-backed sites. 
+ Excellent HTML/CSS skills and you’re kinda proud about it. 
+ Experience using Javascript/jQuery to create amazing user experiences. 
+ The skills and initiative to sometimes single-handedly take a project from concept to launch. 
+ The ability to work effectively with a team of other talented front-end and back-end developers and designExperience using MVC frameworks (CodeIgniter, Cake, Zend, etc.) 

+ Familiarity with Facebook APIs 
+ Gamer at heart.
